snippet.title: Sherlock Holmes Chapter One - Official Cinematic Trailer | Summer of Gaming 2021
snippet.description:
In a new Sherlock Holmes Chapter One cinematic trailer, we get a glimpse at Holmes' incredible mystery solving abilities as he sets to tackle a crime that hits close to home. Sherlock Holmes: Chapter One arrives in 2021 for PS4, PS5, Xbox Series X, Xbox One, and PC.

#IGN #Gaming #SummerOfGaming
